DOC.criteria: Histologically confirm resect ductal pancreatic adenocarcinoma R1 resection and/or positive lymph node . Subject start treatment later 10 week postsurgery . Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status 0 1 . Acceptable hematology parameter : Absolute neutrophil count ≥1500 cell/mm3 Platelet count ≥100,000/mm3 Hemoglobin ( Hgb ) ≥8.0 g/dL Acceptable blood chemistry level : Aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) Alanine transaminase ( ALT ) ≤2.5 × upper limit normal range ( ULN ) Total bilirubin ≤ 2.5 x upper Limit Normal ( ULN ) Serum creatinine within upper limit normal . Cancer antigen ( CA ) 199 ≤ 2.5 x upper Limit Normal ( ULN ) assess within 14 day randomization . No disease recurrence metastasis detect CT/MRI assess within 30 day randomization . Signed informed consent . R2 resection presence metastatic disease . Prior neoadjuvant treatment radiation therapy pancreatic adenocarcinoma . Any malignancy within 5 year prior randomization , exception adequately treat insitu carcinoma cervix , uteri , bladder , nonmelanomatous skin cancer . Active , uncontrolled infection ( ) require systemic therapy , define ongoing signs/symptoms related infection without improvement despite appropriate treatment . Severe , active comorbidity , define follow : Unstable angina and/or congestive heart failure require hospitalization within last 6 month Transmural myocardial infarction within 6 month study registration Uncontrolled hypertension , diabetes arrhythmia . Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease exacerbation respiratory illness require hospitalization . Not able take medicine orally .
